chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Set
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall (p : poly A0 eqA ltM) (L : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)), ~ zerop A A0 eqA n ltM p -> ~ zerop A A0 eqA n ltM (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os p L) -> exists q : poly A0 eqA ltM, In q (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os p L :: L) /\ divp A A0 eqA multA divA n ltM p q /\ ~ zerop A A0 eqA n ltM q

Premises:
zero_mon : forall d : nat, mon d

```coq
Inductive OBuch (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) (cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}) (os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)) : Prop := 
| OBuch_nil : OBuch A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os nil 
| OBuch_cons : forall (a : poly A0 eqA ltM) (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)), ~ zerop A A0 eqA n ltM a -> exists q : poly A0 eqA ltM, In q (a :: Q) /\ divp A A0 eqA multA divA n ltM a q /\ ~ zerop A A0 eqA n ltM q -> OBuch A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os Q.

Lemma reduce_divp : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) (cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}) (os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)) (p q : poly A0 eqA ltM), 
reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec [p] q -> canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> exists r : poly A0 eqA ltM, In r ([q] ++ [p]) /\ divp A A0 eqA multA divA n ltM p r /\ ~ zerop A A0 eqA n ltM r.
Proof.
  intros.
  destruct H as [H1 H2].
  assert (H3: ~ zerop A A0 eqA n ltM p) by auto.
  specialize (H2 _ _ H3).
  destruct H2 as [r [H4 H5]].
  exists r.
  split.
  apply cons_app.
  split.
  apply cons_app.
  auto.
Qed.

Lemma reduceplus_divp_lem : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) (cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}) (os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)) (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) (a b : poly A0 eqA ltM), 
reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM

original: Inductive OBuch (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) (cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}) (os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)) : Prop := | OBuch_nil : OBuch A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os nil | OBuch_cons : forall (a : poly A0 eqA ltM) (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)), ~ zerop A A0 eqA n ltM a -> exists q : poly A0 eqA ltM, In q (a :: Q) /\ divp A A0 eqA multA divA n ltM a q /\ ~ zerop A A0 eqA n ltM q -> OBuch A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os Q.
